object.content:
[BEAUTY TIPS]: USE OF APRICOT OIL AND SEED:
>>BEAUTY TIPS FOR GLOWING FACE AND GLOWING HAIR:
Apricot oil is wonderfully wonderful for health and beauty. For the health.... its oil (unprocessed...just expelled between expellr roller).It is highly above the  Almond oil and Olive oil. Prevent cancerto a great extent.You can cosume its seed by chewing.There are two kind of seeds...Sweet and bitter...both are good ..but bitter one is highly medicinal for health. I am consuming since a long period. consume orally. Pregnnant women must avoid it for consumption.
As far as beauty is concerned ..after having bath just apply 3-4 drops on your face...the whole day your face will be glowing extraoridnarily and apply few drops in your long and wavey  hair...a superb glow for whole the day.I recommend my many of  clients for beauty purpose.

Thanks and best regards with best wishes for good health and condition….Trusting to have been of services to you I remain……..
 
Sincerely Yours,
Madan M Pandey (Ayurveda activist, freelance herbalist and research scholar on fundamentals of Ayurveda and rare remedies)
